posts.post_content: Sent out scans to all who emailed me, of some cards I got today.  Cobb-Bat Off Shoulder plus many beaters.  I'm going to send out another batch of scans when I get done with those tomorrow.  (Hint:  Tinker, Evers, Chance, Mordecai Brown, and other beaters)
This one should go for bucks!  Two or three bucks!  :)
Last week, my private messages was 0.  Today 56.  Thank you to the nice ones.
